Texts.Chs: 把^green;植物分析台^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Sprouting Table^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 试着放一些种子进去，并等待一会。你很快就会得到一些^orange;基因^reset;，用以在^orange;温室^reset;创造^green;新的植物品种^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Try tossing some seeds in there, and wait a bit. You'll soon get some ^orange;Genes^reset; that you can stockpile to create ^green;new types of plants^reset; in the ^orange;Greenhouse.^reset;

Texts.Chs: ^orange;植物分析台^reset;和^orange;基因提取器^reset;是非常有用的设备，可以从任何种类的植物种子中提取^orange;基因^reset;。你肯定很需要这些设备，所以^orange;现在就去建造一个^orange;植物分析台^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Sprouting Tables^reset; and ^orange;Xeno Labs^reset; are useful devices that extract ^orange;Genes^reset; from plant seeds. You will most certainly require them, so ^orange;go ahead and make a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset; now^reset;.
